title: MicroStrategy Boosts Its Bitcoin Holdings to $8 Billion
description: The company has spent $5.9 billion to build its BTC treasury.

title: MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings nearing that of the U.S. government
description:
MicroStrategy bought 14,620 units of Bitcoin for approximately $615.7 million in cash between Nov. 30 and Dec. 26 at an average price of $42,110 per BTC, according to a Dec. 27 Form 8-K filing submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). As of Dec. 26, MicroStrategy holds 189,150 BTC, acquired for approximately $5.895 […]

The post MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings nearing that of the U.S. government appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Microstrategy Acquires More Bitcoin, Raising Total Holdings to 189,150 BTC
description: Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought 14,620 more bitcoin for approximately $615.7 million. The latest purchase raised the company’s cryptocurrency holdings to 189,150 bitcoin, acquired for about $5.9 billion at an average price of $31,168 per coin. Microstrategy’s executive chairman, Michael Saylor, believes that spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) “may be the biggest development on Wall Street […]

title: Pioneers of Enterprise AI: Leading the Charge in a Tech Revolution
description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of enterprise artificial intelligence (AI), a select group of individuals stands out for driving innovation and shaping the future of technology. As AI and cloud computing continue to be pivotal for tech customers, 2023 has seen a surge in generative AI, propelling companies like Microsoft, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and […]

title: Leaked Screenshots Offer Glimpse into Rockstar’s Canceled Game, Agent
description: In a surprising turn of events, previously undisclosed screenshots from Rockstar Games’ canceled project, Agent, have surfaced, providing a rare glimpse into the game that never saw the light of day. This revelation comes more than a decade after the game was first announced and subsequently abandoned, leaving fans in suspense. The leaked images offer […]

title: Terra Luna Classic approves proposal for Commonwealth community platform, seeking to improve moderation and consistency in communication.
description: Proposition 11947 receives 79% of votes in favor, with 35 validators supporting, indicating strong community support. The need for an official forum arises because of deficiencies in the third-party forum, including racism and harassment. The Terra Luna Classic community has taken an important step in its evolution. They have approved the proposal for a community [...]

title: Solana Meme Mania Melts Down: Hype Drains After Brutal Coin Price Crashes
description:
Despite SOL trading above $110, bearish hands have come in after a bullish spike in the Solana memecoins. As a result, the prices of Bonk (BONK), dogwifhat (WIF), and analoS (ANALOS) have fallen significantly. The rapid surge in adverse sentiment has led these memecoins to lose significant value, causing investors to be concerned. This retreat, […]

The post Solana Meme Mania Melts Down: Hype Drains After Brutal Coin Price Crashes appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Change Log: Version 1.87
description:
The Bitfinex Change Log is an overview of all performance and UI changes made to the Bitfinex trading platform. For an overview of all previous changes, please refer to blog.bitfinex.com/category/changelogs. Version 1.86 Features Added the Bitfinex YouTube icon and its link in the footer Added...
